headline.main: NEW-YORK CITY.; Commissioners of Health--The Yellow Fever Case at Williamsburg. DRUNK AND DROWNED. A VERY BAD GIRL. FIRE IN SPRING-STREET.- ARREST OF DOCK THIEVES. KILLED BY A FALL. VERY SUSPICIOUS. FUNERAL OF MR. AUG. T. VAN LIEW. GARROTIG ATTEMPTED IN TOMPKINS SQUARE. ACCIDENT AND GENEROSITY. HONOR TO WHOM HONOR. " THE MURDER OF MR. VAN LIEW FOUND DEAD.- ARREST OF SUSPECIOUS CHARACTERS. zCHARGE OF RECEIVING STOLEN GOODS. ARREST OF A PROFESSED GAMBLER.

docs.lead_paragraph: The above Board of Health met on Thursday noon, in the City Library Room in the City Hall, the President, Jones N PHILLIPS, in the Chair. Present commissioners Dr. WILLIAM ROOKWELL, ?? MILLER, and Dr. R. H. THOMPSON. It was some time after the usual hour of ?? before the commissioners convened, owing to the fact that Dr. ROCKWELL had gone to make inquiries

headline.main: Meeting of Broadway Shopkeepers at the Astor House--The Street Probably to be Cleaned Daily with the Machines.

docs.lead_paragraph: In compliance with a published call, several of the leading Broadway merchants met yesterday, at the Astor House, to perfect arrangements with Mr. SMITH, the proprietor of the street-sweeping machines, for cleaning Broadway daily. M. E. V. HAUGHWOUT was called to the Chair, and FRANKLIN J. OTTARSON, appointed Secretary.

docs.lead_paragraph: A few items of additional European news by the Europa are given in another part of this morning's issue. It is attempted to saddle Russia with the charge of instigating the Indian mutinies, but, ambitious and unscrupulous as Russian Diplomacy is, it can scarcely be held responsible for this insurrection. A mutiny among the sepoys, as every traveler in India well knows, is of frequent occurrence,...

headline.main: The Late Garroting and Murder in Mercer-street.; Van Liew's Friends hold a Meeting and offer $1,000 Reward. A VIGILANCE COMMITTEE TO BE ORGANIZED. THE MEETING TAKES A POLITICAL TURN. Verdict of the Jury-A Man seen robbing the Body. Mr. Van Liew's Friends Meet--A Vigilance Committee to be Organized. QUARANTINE AFFAIRS. New Policemen for the Old Grounds--The New Buildings-Who is to have the Credit? --Prospects-A Truce from the Oystermen.

docs.lead_paragraph: THE HEALTH OF TIIE CITY.-There were two rumors on Monday of deaths in Brooklyn from cholera and yellow fever. But the reports were very ambiguous and rather contradictory. The case of yellow fever proved to have been bilious fever, and the case of cholera was probably not much nearer that disease.

docs.lead_paragraph: It is a thousand pities that Miss MADELEINE SMITH was not a passenger in the Asia last week. The City is getting dull. Murders have ceased to stimulate us. We have become hardened to crime and danger. We should not mind being garroted a little for the sake of a new sensation. Mayor WOOD palls upon the taste, and the Epic warfare of the two Polices is now a tale of yesterday.
docs.abstract: Tried for the murder of L'Angelier at Edinburgh
